DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial study Family Caregiver Palliative Care Intervention support caregiver patient stage II-IV gastrointestinal , gynecologic , urologic lung cancer . Education telephone counseling may reduce stress improve well-being quality life caregiver cancer patient .
DOC.brief_title: Family Caregiver Palliative Care Intervention Supporting Caregivers Patients With Stage II-IV Gastrointestinal , Gynecologic , Urologic Lung Cancers
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Test effect Family Caregiver Palliative Care Intervention ( FCPCI ) family caregiver patient gastrointestinal , gynecologic , urologic lung cancer experimental group caregiver burden caregiving skill preparedness compare family caregiver control group . II . Test effect FCPCI family caregiver patient gastrointestinal , gynecologic , urologic lung cancer experimental group quality life ( QOL ) psychological distress compare family caregiver control group . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . Describe family caregiver ' self-care behavior , compare experimental control group . II . Describe family caregiver ' resource use , compare experimental control group . III . Identify subgroups family caregiver benefit FCPCI relation sociodemographic , health status , patient characteristic . IV . Describe family caregiver ' satisfaction FCPCI . V. Describe caregiver out-of-pocket cost cost intervention . OUTLINE : Participants randomize 1 2 arm . ARM I : Participants receive FCPCI advance practice nurse ( APN ) , comprise 4 home education session weekly follow 4 telephone support session 30 minute monthly 24 hour telephone support available 6 month . ARM II : Participants receive usual care
DOC.criteria: Primary family caregiver cancer patient gastrointestinal ( colorectal , pancreatic , gastric ) , gynecologic , urinary lung cancer enter City Hope treatment followup Primary family caregiver cancer patient diagnose stage IIIV disease Primary family caregiver cancer patient > 6 month prognosis Living within 50 mile radius City Hope
